name: Wbijam.pl Material Design Dark
description:
Wbijam.pl Dark
Działa na wszystkich podstronach np:
http://www.naruto.wbijam.pl/
http://www.onepiece.wbijam.pl/
...
css: @-moz-document domain("wbijam.pl"){.lista,.lista_hover a:hover,body,table,td,td[class=lista_td_calendar],th,tr{color:var(--primaryTextColor)}#tresc_lewa,.lista td{padding:10px;box-shadow:0 3px 9px rgba(0,0,0,.16),0 3px 9px rgba(0,0,0,.23)}#tresc_lewa,.lista td,.tresc_bar,.tresc_bar_nowy{box-shadow:0 3px 9px rgba(0,0,0,.16),0 3px 9px rgba(0,0,0,.23)}*,.lista_hover a:hover,.odtwarzacz_link:hover,.pmenu li a,.pmenu li.red a,.vid_link:hover,a:hover{text-decoration:none}*{margin:0;padding:0;border:0;line-height:1.4em;vertical-align:baseline;outline:0}:root{--primaryColor:#212121;--primaryLightColor:#484848;--primaryDarkColor:#000000;--secondaryColor:#29b6f6;--secondaryLightColor:#73e8ff;--secondaryDarkColor:#0086c3;--primaryTextColor:#ffffff;--secondaryTextColor:#000000}body{background:var(--primaryLightColor);font-family:Roboto,sans-serif;font-size:14px}td,th{padding:15px 5px;display:table-cell;text-align:left;vertical-align:middle;border-radius:2px}.lista,.lista td,table,td,th{border:none}td,tr{margin-left:-.75rem;margin-right:-.75rem}table,td,th,tr{background:var(--primaryColor)}.lista{background:#212121;width:100%;clear:both;max-width:100%;margin-bottom:2rem}.lista_hover.active a,.lista_hover.active td{color:var(--primaryTextColor);background-color:var(--secondaryDarkColor)}.episode-calendar-wrapper{background-color:var(--secondaryDarkColor)!important}#menu_prawa,#tresc_lewa,.naglowek,.naglowek_fb{background:#212121;color:var(--primaryTextColor)}.naglowek,.naglowek_fb{border:none;font-size:16px}#szkielet{flex:1 auto;display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:center;width:100%}#tresc_lewa{margin:10px;flex:1 auto;border-radius:2px;width:100%}#menu_prawa{margin:10px;flex:1 1 auto}.pod_naglowek{border:none;font-size:16px}.pmenu_naglowek_blue{background:var(--secondaryColor)}.pmenu_naglowek_red{background:#FF5252}.pmenu li a{color:var(--primaryTextColor)}.pmenu li.red a{color:#FF5252}.tresc,.tresc_bar,.tresc_bar_nowy{background:#212121;color:var(--primaryTextColor)}.tresc{border:none}.tresc_bar{flex:1;border-radius:2px}.tresc_bar_nowy{flex:1 1 auto;border:none}.tresc_bar_data{flex:1;width:100%}.tresc_bar_fb{flex:1 1 auto}.tresc_zdjecie{float:left;margin-right:10px;margin-bottom:2px;border:none}a,a:hover,a:link,a:visited{color:var(--secondaryColor);text-decoration:none}.vid_link,a:hover,li,ul{color:var(--primaryTextColor)}.vid_link:hover{color:#FF5252}.odtwarzacz_link,.odtwarzaj_vk,.ogladaj_wideo_vk{color:var(--primaryTextColor)}.odtwarzacz_link:hover,font[color=blue]{color:var(--secondaryColor)}font[color=green]{color:#4CAF50}.episode-calendar-wrapper.active[rel="TŁUMACZENIE"],font[color=red]{color:#FF5252}img[src="images/new_icon.gif"]{content:url(http://i.imgur.com/bGU87SB.png)}img[src="images/data.gif"]{content:url(http://i.imgur.com/UHYcjC4.png)}img[src="images/tv_info.gif"]{content:url(http://i.imgur.com/pXGgFhb.png)}img[src="images/artykul_info.gif"]{content:url(http://i.imgur.com/zFLoEYA.png)}img[src="images/news_info.gif"]{content:url(http://i.imgur.com/7akaR6l.png)}a[href="gma-001.html"],a[href="gma-002.html"],a[href="gma-003.html"],a[href="gma-004.html"],a[href="gma-005.html"],a[href="gma-006.html"],a[href="gma-007.html"],a[href="gma-008.html"],a[href="gma-009.html"],a[href="gma-010.html"],a[href="gma-011.html"],a[href="gma-013.html"],a[href="gma-026.html"],a[href="gma-027.html"],a[href="gma-028.html"],a[href="gma-029.html"],a[href="gma-030.html"],a[href="gma-036.html"]{content:url('data:#')}}
